entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Evolve the DbDataReader enumerability story #98903
    Future

Closed

  • ILLink: TrimmerRootAssembly: error IL1032: Root assembly '…' could not be found #93799
  • NativeAOT: Memset/Memcpy helpers don't throw NRE #95517
    9.0.0
  • memcpy/memset helpers on CoreCLR may not be suspension-friendly #98620
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `DbDataReaderEnumerator` with `MoveNextAsync` #98890
  • NativeAot proposal: set /DEPENDENTLOADFLAG linker flag by default on Windows #98619
  • Introduction of File Provider Registry for DI #98850

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: improve throughput of the RLCSE greedy heuristic #98906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove GT_STORE_DYN_BLK #98905
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expand small value sets to all case permutations in SearchValues<string> #98902
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Skip long values when building Rabin-Karp buckets in SearchValues #98901
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Expand ignoreCase to case-sensitive optimization to non-ASCII SearchValues #98900
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Add issue template for localization data issues #98899
    area-System.Globalization
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 122.0.6261.69, windows: 122.0.6261.69 #98898
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Add timezone data to devcontainer #98904
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move memset/memcpy helpers to managed impl #98623
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build Mac symbols in .dSYM bundle, not single .dwarf file #96456
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [runtime] Infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix ValueType.GetHashCode not calling overriden method on nested field #98754
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME in objectnative.cpp to QCall #97641
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace unaligned casts in Buffer.Memmove #98812
    area-System.Buffers
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Add a 'compile-in-child' AOT argument #98866
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • You must install or update .NET to run this application repeatedly error returns after repair steps . #38999

Closed

  • `dotnet list package --vulnerable` should return non-zero exit code when vulnerabilities found #38994

PullRequests

Created

  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Discussion: Prototype for `dotnet tool update --all` #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Updated

  • Use `Convert.ToHexStringLower` #38965
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Select the first TFM when `run`ning a multi-targeted application #38995
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38989
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Use an infinite timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #38938

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix the log contention in correctness legs #72263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR SauceLab tests no longer running #54218
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, mapaction #54217
  • Blazor server - Static files from wwwroot doesn't load using IIS (404) #54216
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, updates #54213
  • ASP0018 analyzer does not respect complex model binding #54212
  • CascadingParameter in EditForm causes InputText to re-render on every keystroke which loses cursor position. #54208

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #54214
  • Perf regression: mvc #54205
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, mvc, plainTextWithFilter #54195

PullRequests

Created

  • Update TestRazorCompiledItem.cs #54211
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • duplicated word in xml doc #54210
    area-blazor, community-contribution
